mapper.select: { call proc_insert( #{ empno, mode = IN, jdbcType = NUMERIC }, #{ ename, mode = IN, jdbcType = VARCHAR }, #{ deptno, mode = IN, jdbcType = NUMERIC }, #{ job, mode = IN, jdbcType = VARCHAR }, #{ row_cnt, mode = OUT, jdbcType = NUMERIC }, #{ msg, mode = OUT, jdbcType = VARCHAR } )}
{ call proc_zipcode( #{ dong,mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ data, mode = OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=java.sql.ResultSet,resultMap=map } ) }
